page.title: 03LOCAL TRANSPORT
page.content: There are 2 railway stations in Edenbridge, but only one in our Domesday block.There are 4 petrol stations in our square. A survey we did showed that about 225 vehicles used the High Street in a 15 minute period in mid-afternoon. The trains from the bottom station go to Oxted,London & Uckfield, and the trains from the top station go to Redhill & Tonbridge.On Sundays the trains do not run.They are thinking of running a high-speed train through Edenbridge.There is 1 bus station in Edenbridge.At the moment a possibility of a by-pass is growing.We asked 50 people what they think of a by-pass being built in the Edenbridge area.15% said' the possibility is growing.'....by Paul Stanyer & Gary Wenn......
